nl.nikhef.xhtmlrenderer.swing
Interface ITemplateContainer

All Superinterfaces:
IDocumentContainer
All Known Subinterfaces:
ITemplatePanel
All Known Implementing Classes:
RequestWizard, TemplateButtonPanel, TemplatePanel, TemplateWizard
public interface ITemplateContainer
extends IDocumentContainer

TemplatePanel methods related to the TemplateDocument.

getDocument, getDocumentTitle, getURL, reloadDocument, reloadDocument, setDocument, setDocument, setDocument, setDocument, setDocument, setDocument, setDocument, setDocumentFromString
 

Method Detail

setData

void setData(Properties p)
Set the properties to use for the template and form elements.

Also reparses the document and updates the panel, if a template was set.

Parameters:
p - New properties to set

data

Properties data()
Return the properties.

Use this to retrieve data from form elements. The name of each element has a corresponding property key, and the value of the property is updated when the form element changes.

setDocument

void setDocument(TemplateDocument doc)
Renders an ITemplateDocument instance.

Parameters:
doc - template to show, this will be processed with the data supplied by this container.

refresh

boolean refresh()
Refresh the contents so that all parsing is redone.

Note that the template may or may not be retrieved again from its source.

This happens automatically in setData(java.util.Properties) and setDocument(nl.nikhef.xhtmlrenderer.swing.TemplateDocument).

Returns:
true on success, false if no document URI is available

setSubmitAction

void setSubmitAction(Action e)
Set the action to perform on form submission.

If this is set to null, the standard behaviour is done: posting data to the url supplied by the form.
